thread.title: Nick Koulias
thread.title_full: Fesal recensione scritta da Nick Koulias

author: Nick Koulias
title: Nick Koulias
text: Antonio and Filippo provided an incredible shopping experience. We were hesitant at first as we had never purchased such expensive items online before. Antonio and Filippo helped us every step of the way including triple checking the order before dispatch. We received the products in a very secure wooden box and the package arrived on time, exactly as requested. We will be using them again without reservation. In fact we are now awaiting our second shipment.
